GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v5.10.166
GSD.description:
net: mdio: validate parameter addr in mdiobus_get_phy()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.166 by commit 4bc5f1f6bc94e695dfd912122af96e7115a0ddb8, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit 7f854420fbfe9d49afe2ffb1df052cfe8e215541. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: mdio: validate parameter addr in mdiobus_get_phy()
